amendment.description: To clarify eligibility criteria for agricultural irrigation assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 945 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 945 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 945 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 945 proposed by Senator Stabenow for Senator Sessions.
